# reloadItem(_:)

**Instance Method**

Reloads and redisplays the data for the given item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func reloadItem(_ item: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **item**: The item to reload and display.

## Discussion

Reloading the cell views associated with `item` occurs only in apps that link against macOS 10.12 and later.

This method may cause the outline view to change its selection without calling the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOutlineViewDelegate/outlineViewSelectionDidChange(_:)] delegate method.

## Redisplaying Information

- **reloadItem(_:reloadChildren:)**: Reloads a given item and, optionally, its children.
